table_description: A Zone is a domain name along with its subdomains and other identities.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Zone identifier tag.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The domain name.

columns.name: betas
columns.description: Beta feature flags associated with the zone.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: When the zone was created.

columns.name: deactivation_reason
columns.description: TODO

columns.name: development_mode
columns.description: The interval (in seconds) from when development mode expires (positive integer) or last expired (negative integer) for the domain. If development mode has never been enabled, this value is 0.

columns.name: dnssec
columns.description: DNSSEC settings for the zone.

columns.name: host
columns.description: TODO

columns.name: meta
columns.description: Metadata associated with the zone.

columns.name: modified_on
columns.description: When the zone was last modified.

columns.name: name_servers
columns.description: Cloudflare-assigned name servers. This is only populated for zones that use Cloudflare DNS.

columns.name: original_dnshost
columns.description: DNS host at the time of switching to Cloudflare.

columns.name: original_name_servers
columns.description: Original name servers before moving to Cloudflare.

columns.name: original_registrar
columns.description: Registrar for the domain at the time of switching to Cloudflare.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Information about the user or organization that owns the zone.

columns.name: paused
columns.description: Indicates if the zone is only using Cloudflare DNS services. A true value means the zone will not receive security or performance benefits.

columns.name: permissions
columns.description: Available permissions on the zone for the current user requesting the item.

columns.name: settings
columns.description: Simple key value map of zone settings like advanced_ddos = on. Full settings details are in settings_src.

columns.name: plan
columns.description: Current plan associated with the zone.

columns.name: plan_pending
columns.description: Pending plan change associated with the zone.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the zone.

columns.name: type
columns.description: A full zone implies that DNS is hosted with Cloudflare. A partial zone is typically a partner-hosted zone or a CNAME setup.

columns.name: vanity_name_servers
columns.description: Custom name servers for the zone.
